mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_project_baseinfo (PROJECT_CD, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_CUSTOMER, PROJECT_SALES_MAN, PROJECT_PRICE_TOTAL, PROJECT_STATUS, PROJECT_CREATER, PROJECT_STARTTIME, PROJECT_ENDTIME, PARAM1, PARAM2, PARAM3, PARAM4, PARAM5, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME) values (#{projectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectSalesMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectPriceTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectCreater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectStarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectEndtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())

mapper.update:
update tb_project_baseinfo
PROJECT_CD = #{projectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_CUSTOMER = #{projectCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_SALES_MAN = #{projectSalesMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_PRICE_TOTAL = #{projectPriceTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_STATUS = #{projectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_CREATER = #{projectCreater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_STARTTIME = #{projectStarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ENDTIME = #{projectEndtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM1 = #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM2 = #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM3 = #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM4 = #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM5 = #{param5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATETIME = now()
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_project_baseinfo set PROJECT_CD = #{projectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_CUSTOMER = #{projectCustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_SALES_MAN = #{projectSalesMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_PRICE_TOTAL = #{projectPriceTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_STATUS = #{projectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_CREATER = #{projectCreater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_STARTTIME = #{projectStarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ENDTIME = #{projectEndtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM1 = #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM2 = #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM3 = #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM4 = #{param4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM5 = #{param5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = now() where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM TB_PROJECT_BASEINFO ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT BASEINFO.ID ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_CD ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_NAME ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_CUSTOMER ,PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_SALES_MAN ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_PRICE_TOTAL ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_STATUS ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_STARTTIME ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_ENDTIME ,date_format(BASEINFO.CREATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATETIME FROM TB_PROJECT_BASEINFO BASEINFO LEFT JOIN TB_PROJECT_PRODUCT PRODUCT ON BASEINFO.ID = PRODUCT.PROJECT_ID WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY BASEINFO.ID ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_CD ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_NAME ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_CUSTOMER ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_SALES_MAN ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_PRICE_TOTAL ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_STATUS ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_STARTTIME ,BASEINFO.PROJECT_ENDTIME ,BASEINFO.CREATETIME ,PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME ORDER BY ID DESC
select count(1) from tb_project_baseinfo where PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName}
